valueProposition.primary: Scale your sales with AI-powered personalization, smart scheduling, and deliverability protection
valueProposition.secondary: Send thousands of personalized emails that actually reach the inbox and convert prospects into customers

problemStatement.title: The Cold Email Challenge
problems: Manual personalization takes hours for each prospect
Poor deliverability means emails end up in spam folders
Managing multiple email accounts and sequences is complex
No visibility into what's working and what's not
New email accounts get flagged without proper warmup

solution.title: The Complete Cold Email Automation Solution
solution.description: ColdReach Pro eliminates the manual work of cold email outreach while maintaining the personal touch that converts. Our AI-powered platform handles everything from personalization to deliverability, so you can focus on closing deals.

coreFeatures.name: AI-Powered Personalization
coreFeatures.shortDescription: Generate personalized emails for thousands of prospects in minutes
coreFeatures.detailedDescription: Our advanced AI analyzes prospect data including company information, recent news, social media activity, and industry trends to create highly personalized opening lines and email content. Scale personalization to thousands of prospects without sacrificing quality.
benefits: Higher open and reply rates with relevant content
Multiple AI templates for different industries
Custom prompt creation for specific use cases

coreFeatures.name: Smart Scheduling & Timing
coreFeatures.shortDescription: Optimize send times based on recipient time zones and engagement patterns
coreFeatures.detailedDescription: Maximize open rates by sending emails when recipients are most likely to engage. Our smart scheduling considers time zones, business hours, industry patterns, and individual engagement history to determine optimal send times.
benefits: 25% higher open rates with optimal timing
Automatic time zone detection and respect
Gradual ramp-up for new email accounts
Rate limiting to protect sender reputation
useCases: Global outreach across multiple time zones

coreFeatures.name: Email Warmup & Deliverability
coreFeatures.shortDescription: Automatically warm up email accounts and protect sender reputation
coreFeatures.detailedDescription: Ensure your emails reach the inbox with our comprehensive warmup and deliverability protection. We gradually increase sending volume, monitor reputation metrics, and provide real-time deliverability insights.

coreFeatures.name: Multi-Step Email Sequences
coreFeatures.shortDescription: Create automated follow-up sequences with conditional logic
coreFeatures.detailedDescription: Build sophisticated email sequences that adapt based on recipient behavior. Set up conditional logic to stop sequences when prospects reply, skip steps based on engagement, and create different paths for different response types.

coreFeatures.name: Advanced Analytics & Tracking
coreFeatures.shortDescription: Track performance with detailed analytics and reporting
coreFeatures.detailedDescription: Get comprehensive insights into your email campaign performance with real-time tracking, detailed analytics, and actionable reporting. Monitor opens, clicks, replies, and conversions to optimize your outreach strategy.

coreFeatures.name: Team Collaboration & Management
coreFeatures.shortDescription: Manage multiple accounts and collaborate with team members
coreFeatures.detailedDescription: Scale your outreach efforts with team collaboration features. Manage multiple email accounts, assign campaigns to team members, share templates and sequences, and maintain consistent messaging across your organization.

primary.description: Individual sales reps and account executives looking to scale their prospecting efforts
Growing sales organizations needing to standardize and scale outreach processes

Complete solution from contact management to analytics, eliminating the need for multiple tools
Intuitive interface that doesn't require technical expertise, allowing sales teams to get started immediately
